about_the_game:
CrabMania is a competitive Party Game of between two and four simultaneous players.
Each player controls a character and must eliminate the other competitors by throwing a unique object that appears on the stage.
Every stage has its obstacles and difficulties that the player must overcome while trying to accomplish the objective.

Easy But Difficult


Crabmania is design to be a family friendy game, from youngest to adults. It is easy to pick up regardless of age or gaming experience but this does not mean that the game is easy! it's gonna be a fun family competition!

Game Modes

CrabMania can be played in three different ways:

  • Classic: Play different levels. The first player to reach the target amount of stars wins the match.
  • Alarm Clock: Play different levels until the time´s up. The player with most stars at the end of the match wins.
  • Arena: Fixed time. The player with most stars at the end of the match wins. Players respawn after each death.

  • All modes can be played in teams.-
